name: Son of a Switch
description:
Made this for a gamejam, Theme: Digital
WASD to Move
Only control you have over the world is LMB on the Robots

[Command List]
move
rotate left
rotate right
grab
drop
wait
Note: the game has been setup to introduce you to this list, however you might accidentally delete it.

[Known Errors]
- Common Error with Collisions and Moving Objects
- Robots can't determine blocking from other robots
- Scripts Run on console close
- Coffee is Low

[GUIDE]

The 3rd level: [REQUIRES (grab and drop)]
-(Right of the entrance) is a Spawner. Press the button to spawn aluminium parts.
-(Middle of the room) is the Compressor. Place Aluminium parts on the right side of the compressor.   Activate the compressor. Aluminium Block should appear on the left side.
-Move the Aluminium Block to the Final Machine (far left) and deposit to unlock the door.

Note: I didn't have enough time to texture them appropriately, so they don't have any markings or labels. Ultimately it would be very clear what each machine does, but ya, all I could do.
